title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4036.4 - Jockey penalized for excess weight
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4036.4 - Jockey penalized for excess weight

State Regulations

If a horse carries more than two pounds over such
horse's proper or declared weight, such horse's jockey shall be punished unless
the stewards are satisfied that such excess of weight has been caused by rain
or mud. Notes

ยง
4036.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
